title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama CLI and server for running large language models locally with a simple API.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama, wrapping the REST API with idiomatic Python helpers.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same API surface as the Python client.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package exposing Ollama models as standard LangChain LLMs and embedders.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web interface for Ollama featuring multi-model chats, code highlighting, RAG uploads.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama supporting sync/async APIs, streaming, and custom options.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem providing a fluent interface to Ollama’s REST API with ActiveModel-style convenience.

title: ollama-cli (community)
summary: Feature-rich TUI wrapper around Ollama written in Rust with conversation history and fuzzy search.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local AI pair-programming via Ollama models with inline suggestions.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset allowing Ollama models to be used as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes showing how to run Ollama on Raspberry Pi, GPU offloading, multi-modal vision, etc.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with autoscaling and PVC support.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Flutter desktop app for chatting with Ollama models offline on Windows/macOS/Linux.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Nim language client for Ollama with macro-based DSL for concise prompt templates.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Async Rust crate wrapping Ollama endpoints using reqwest and serde for strong typing.

title: ollama-django
summary: Reusable Django app adding Ollama chat completions as a management command and REST endpoint.

title: ollama-kit
summary: Swift Package Manager library for iOS/macOS apps wanting to integrate local Ollama models via HTTP.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models through slash commands.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit component for quick internal chat UIs backed by Ollama, including session memory and RAG.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin for local AI note assistance using Ollama: summarization, translation, continuation.
